allow: Bash(cmd /c "mkdir app\(auth)\login app\(auth)\signup app\(dashboard)\chat app\(dashboard)\files app\(dashboard)\settings components\ui components\chat components\files components\layout lib 2>nul || exit 0")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist .env.local (echo File exists) else (echo File NOT found)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist .cursorrules (echo File exists) else (echo File NOT found)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist .cursor\rules (echo Directory exists) else (echo Directory NOT found)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist .github\copilot-instructions.md (echo File exists) else (echo File NOT found)")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist CLAUDE.md (echo File exists) else (echo File NOT found)")
Bash(cmd /c "mkdir app\admin app\admin\organizations app\admin\organizations\[id] app\admin\families app\admin\users 2>nul || exit 0")

Bash(cmd /c "if exist app\(dashboard)\families\[familyId]\care-persons\[id]\page.tsx (copy app\(dashboard)\families\[familyId]\care-persons\[id]\page.tsx app\(dashboard)\families\[id]\care-persons\[carePersonId]\page.tsx) else (echo File NOT found)")
